body: This isn't actually Ruqqus's fault. In the past year for some reason a huge portion of conservatives, or rather *former* conservatives, have suddenly abandoned everything they used to believe in and started moving towards more authright attitudes. And these people are the majority of the userbase here. I've observed the same shift in real life, sadly it includes several people I know personally. I think the problem is how sheep-like and groupthinking people are, and how lately the right has become more about fighting the left than its own ideology. Humans aren't known for sticking to principles, they just want to dominate and control everything for their own benefit, and are also extremely tribalistic and group-minded about it.

Humans aren't known for sticking to principles, they just want to dominate and control everything for their own benefit, and are also extremely tribalistic and group-minded about it.

post.body:
So yeah, I know I'm going to get called names and downvoted, but this is *unpopular* opinion, right? I know posting an unpopular idea on a sub for unpopular ideas is a radical idea and all. I like Ruqqus. I really do and I want it to succeed, but there is way too much racism on this site. I feel gross just seeing a post with people saying racist things. Look, I'm not perfect and I think satire is funny sometimes, but I know for a fact a lot of shit on here is not satire. You can call me whatever names you want, I don't care. I am a conservative guy and I'm on here because I hate big tech and MSM, not because I want to see racists posting nasty things all the time. Being a Conservative is not about being a racist - I believe all people are equal. I know this is a free speech site and I understand that being free speech is going to open up to site to stuff like that and I'm not saying Ruqqus needs to change their policies, but damn does this site sometimes disappoint me. I just wish for once we could see a conservative/censorship-free site succeed and people like that are the ones who always cause the downfall. 

*NAMECALLING INBOUND*

body: It's very little to do with that. It's mostly because of social norms and "moral" expectations that men entreat women to everything. Sometimes it's because they're the "weaker" sex, other times it's because they're "oppressed" but it's all a tactic for the same goal. This is hardly going away anytime soon. The instinct to care about women 1000x more than men is deeply rooted in biology and the order of nature and reproduction. Despite their pride humans are still animals acting on instinct, it's just a lot more social and violent than normal. Probably the only reason I can see this is bullshit is because I have autism which basically makes me a different species. Even still I feel some primal urges, and automatically caring about something I recognize as female more than the opposite is one of them. But it's almost seperate from my conscious mind and I think almost everything humans do is dumb. *Literally* their excuse for everything is "Because, now fall in line or else".

The reason they do is because women are sexually selective, and they know most men badly want pussy, so they will use this to manipulate them. Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. parent.body:
>lol wait hold up now what is 'white'??

Do you see what I mean about you being brainwashed? This is a conditioned response and you know it. You *know* what White represents. You *know* who it refers to and you know who I refer to when I refer to blacks.

You know what *is* a unique phenomenon? White people being told they have to act responsibly and carefully while every other race on the planet wears their bigotry on their shoulder and advocates for their race without fear.

parent.body:
I'm not saying you did. You'd probably be very eager to see it never happen. Eventually, that will involve advocating for White people whether you acknowledge race or not.

I didn't grow up thinking I'd want to advocate on behalf of my race. Nor do a lot of White people these days, I imagine. It's something White people *need to do.* We cannot afford to live off contrarian ideologies that assert race is nothing when not only is it a valid notion but a notion that is forced upon Whites whether they like it or not. If you're even remotely White, in behavior or genetic makeup, you've become a target for bigotry and hostility that's evident everywhere.

post.body:
This would require:

>altering chromosomes from XY to XX

>altering all bone structure and physical structure in general

>altering sexual organs to perfectly mimic those of the sex they're changing to

>altering all hormones

>altering all general physical characteristics like growth of facial hair or balding

>altering all aging specific sexual conditions like menopause

>ability to bear children

>vocal change

>altering fat distribution

>adding perfect breasts

>altering facial characteristics

I defy you to tell me why I should not under these circumstances.
post.body_html:
This would require:

altering chromosomes from XY to XX

altering all bone structure and physical structure in general

altering sexual organs to perfectly mimic those of the sex they're changing to

altering all hormones

altering all general physical characteristics like growth of facial hair or balding

altering all aging specific sexual conditions like menopause

ability to bear children

vocal change

altering fat distribution

adding perfect breasts

altering facial characteristics

I defy you to tell me why I should not under these circumstances.
post.title: If medical science existed that could actually perfectly change a person's sex, I would bang a tranny

parent.body: I don't actually disagree with you, but it's not my point. My point is that the current crop of Right Wing conservatives push religion as a mainstay of the ideology. It really shouldn't be. There should be just as many atheist and polytheist conservatives as anything. We should move away from it in order to gain ground in the US, and push back with equal force that we've seen from the left.
parent.body_html: I don't actually disagree with you, but it's not my point. My point is that the current crop of Right Wing conservatives push religion as a mainstay of the ideology. It really shouldn't be. There should be just as many atheist and polytheist conservatives as anything. We should move away from it in order to gain ground in the US, and push back with equal force that we've seen from the left.

parent.body: A lot of people complain about the loss of "god" or whatever here. But I think the bigger problem is the loss of a sense of morality. Its not religion that is important (but you should be free to believe what you like), its the lack of a concept of morals and the lack of social consequences for immoral behavior.
parent.body_html: A lot of people complain about the loss of "god" or whatever here. But I think the bigger problem is the loss of a sense of morality. Its not religion that is important (but you should be free to believe what you like), its the lack of a concept of morals and the lack of social consequences for immoral behavior.

parent.body: I know where you're heads at because I usually think the same thing, and the problem with Libertarianism is it has no teeth. There's no enforcement of good behavior that is required since we are such imperfect animals. My point is that a real old timey conservatism could come back if its roots lay within it's own written principals rather than interpretation of ancient texts.

parent.body:
> judeo christian

Stop slipping Jews into Christianity 

But other than that Christianity has been externally beneficial for western society, allowing for an objective morality and allowed for the creation of high trust societies.

Without it we would be stuck in the Bronze Age with either Muslims or Chinese being the major power 

The USA was the most based between the late 1800s and the early 1900s

To say it holds back conservatism is forgetting the fact it holds together conservatism.
parent.body_html:
judeo christian

Stop slipping Jews into Christianity

But other than that Christianity has been externally beneficial for western society, allowing for an objective morality and allowed for the creation of high trust societies.

Without it we would be stuck in the Bronze Age with either Muslims or Chinese being the major power

The USA was the most based between the late 1800s and the early 1900s

To say it holds back conservatism is forgetting the fact it holds together conservatism.
